players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious."
Diana: "I'll protect Alice. Vote wisely."
You: "Thanks Diana, considering Charlie's claim. Voting on Charlie."
You: "Considering Charlie's claim, I'm voting on him. Stay vigilant."
Diana: "Will protect Alice. Vote carefully."
Charlie: "Thanks for the info. Alice, keep an eye on Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious."
Diana: "I'll protect Alice. Vote wisely."
Alice: "Thanks Diana, considering Charlie's claim. Voting on Charlie."
Alice: "Considering Charlie's claim, I'm voting on him. Stay vigilant."
Diana: "Will protect Alice. Vote carefully."
You: "Thanks for the info. Alice, keep an eye on Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

players.name: Diana

Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Considering Charlie's claim, I'm voting on him. Stay vigilant."
You: "Will protect Alice. Vote carefully."
